cast.name: 梅丽尔·斯特里普 Meryl Streep
达尼埃尔·布吕 Daniel Boulud

this_title: Monet's Palate: A Gastronomic View from the Gardens of Giverny
introduction: Monet's Palate is a documentary which examines the connection between fine art and fine cuisine as seen through the eyes of Claude Monet. Meryl Streep's opening narration takes the viewer through the region of Normandy in France and Monet's Home and Gardens. The greatest Chefs of the world including Alice Waters, Daniel Boulud, Roger Verge, Anne Willan and Michel Richard, prepare the cuisine Claude Monet adored. Interviews include Steve Wynn and Joachim Pissarro.
chinese_title: Monet's Palate: A Gastronomic View from the Gardens of Giverny
